registrationEmail.subject: WSO2 App Factory - Registration completed
registrationEmail.body:
Hi $name,
Congratulations! You have successfully created an account in WSO2 App Factory.
Your Admin Name: $adminName Your Domain: $tenant
Your User Name: $username
Best Regards, WSO2 App Factory https://apps.appfactory.private.wso2.com:9443/appmgt
